titles: Walk knaves, walk. A discourse intended to have been spoken at court and now publish'd for the satisfaction of all those that have participated of the svveetness of publike employments. By Hodg Tvrbervil, chaplain to the late Lord Hevvson.
author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.
notes: Hodg Turbervil is a pseudonym for Edmund Gayton.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, and the British Library.
keywords: English wit and humor --  Early works to 1800.
Civil service --  Great Britain --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Officials and employees --  Early works to 1800.
